{"id":402312238,"lang":"java","time":"9Â months","timestamp":1601397725,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/402312238/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"40.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean checkPossibility(int[] nums) {\n        int n = nums.length;\n        if (nums.length <= 2) return true;\n        for (int i = 1; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            if (nums[i - 1] > nums[i]) {\n                if (i != n - 1 && nums[i - 1] > nums[i + 1])\n                    nums[i - 1] = nums[i];\n                else\n                    nums[i] = nums[i - 1];\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        for (int i = 1; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            if (nums[i - 1] > nums[i]) return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array"}
